title: Best Tampon I Have Ever Used
content: This is the best tampon on the market I have been using tampax since I was 12 they are so comfortable don't even know I wearing one easy to insert and easy to remove although I also wear a pantieliner to save my panties just in case there is a leak and this work out very well for me.Thank you tampax for making my period more bearable. My next move is to try the menstrual cup my sisters love their cups.
